short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: ADZE Recommendation Protocol. Share links with your friends.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
ADZE is a tool you can use to share links with your friends, and their friends, etc. Reinvent the original magic of the web!

See more at https://www.adze.network/

If you wanted to find a great camera in real life, before search engines were a thing, you might have asked a friend who's really into photography for a recommendation. They, in turn, might consult their network. Adze recaptures this formula, and makes it scale to the whole web.

To that end, adze is a way you can share really good links with your friends. It's not an app, or platform run by some business. Nor is it a cryptocurrency you have to buy to use.  Adze both finds good content and filters out bad content using your values, and those of people you explicitly trust.  If someone is doing something you don't like on adze, you can block them and you'll never be affected by them on the web again.   If you want to, you can be exposed to content  that was highly rated by friends of people you trust, but the core adze philosophy is to push control to the edges of the network as much as possible.  

Adze is starting its life as a browser plugin. Right now there are some rough edges, but we hope to make this much more accessible to everyone, and to dramatically expand its capabilities.
